metrics.name: Overdue and open Accounts Receivable items
metrics.description: Number of overdue open customer items
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE (${invoice_overdue_condition} OR ${open_accounts_receivable_condition})) > 0
	)

metrics.name: 1 Overdue and open Accounts Receivable items items
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE 
      (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
      	WHERE("InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" IS NULL
		  AND "InvoiceDueDate" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
          ) > 0
	)

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice was cleared after its due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE (${invoice_overdue_condition})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN (${billing_clearing_events})))
	) 
* 100

metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

metricVariables.name: billing_clearing_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that an invoice was cleared, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: open_accounts_receivable_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has not been cleared so far, although it was expected to. For example: NOW() > "InvoiceDueDate"

metricVariables.name: invoice_overdue_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was cleared after the due date, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"

metricVariables.name: ontime_delivery_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that a delivery is on time, for example "DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime" = 'Yes'
